name: SCP-479: Shadows of the Mind
description:
SCP-479: Shadows of the Mind — a hardcore first-person psychological horror where your actions and interaction with the environment lead to different outcomes.

Mind Trial: Play as a Class D personnel caught in the Foundation's experiment, where he must learn to deal with unclear and ominous phenomena.

Mysterious Gameplay: Solve puzzles, find keys, and confront SCP-479.

Choice and Consequences: Your actions determine one of more than ten different endings.

Gloomy Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a world with impressive photorealistic graphics, where every moment can push you to the brink of madness.

Special Containment Procedures Foundation: Dive into SCP-479: Shadows of the Mind, an unusual psychological adventure in the SCP universe.

Will you seek the truth in the labyrinth of your mind and preserve your sanity in this unique psychological trial?
